import React, { useState } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function IssuesForm({ postIssue, history, edit, projects }) { const [state, setstate] = useState({ title: undefined, description: undefined, targetEndDate: undefined, projectId: undefined, }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() postIssue(state) history.go(0) } console.log(state) const projectOptions = projects.map((project, i) => { return }) const handleChange = (e) => { setstate({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
{edit ? "Edit Issue" : "Create Issue"}
{edit ?
:
}
) } export default withRouter(IssuesForm)
